title: Stunning 3BR / 1.5 bath, Luxury Remodel, SAFE NEIGHBORHOOD  +PARKING
posting_body: ['Please note: 720+ credit required.', 'We are offering a gorgeous 3BR /1.5 Bath  apartment in a private house located in the very safe, convenient and quiet neighborhood of Woodlawn in the North Bronx.', ' This is a a brand new remodeled 3BR/ 1.5 bath with dining room, full eat in kitchen, large living room, and 3 large bedrooms capable of fitting 2 king sized beds and a twin bed.', 'The kitchen has granite counters, stainless appliances, designer shaker cabinets, high hat lighting, and porcellain backsplash and flooring.', 'The living room has high hat lighting and the entire apartment has designer finishes.', 'This apartment also comes with a personal washer drier for the tenants dedicated own use, there is shared use of the backyard, and for a modest fee there is a dedicated private parking spot and garage ( capable of parking 2 cars) right in front of the house.', 'The apartment also comes with Central A/C and the tenant controls their own heating thermostat.', 'Landlord provides hot water.', ' Its a 30 min ride to Grand Central on the  Metro North RR.', ' City Buses, and Subways are all within 1-3 blocks walking distance.', 'Please  No Smoking, No Music/ noise.', ' A private 1 car  garage and an additional outdoor parking spot  ( 2 cars total) are available for a modest additional fee  Viewings by appointment only.', 'NOTE: please provide your individual incomes, credit scores and the number of persons who will be occupying the space.', 'Provide a call back number so that we may set up a viewing.']
